DOC.brief_summary: The propose study randomize control trial compare effectiveness electronic personalize health screen app incorporate motivational feedback ( i.e . `` Check Yourself '' ) usual care among moderate high risk alcohol user . The purpose study determine whether Check Yourself effective usual care reduce alcohol consumption binge drink improve quality care among adolescent receive school-based health clinic service .
DOC.criteria: Eligible individual 1318 year old able read comprehend English . Participants indicate alcohol use consistent moderate high risk Check Yourself App . Individuals exclude study : They meet age requirement Do study visit participate schoolbased health clinic Lack mean complete followup interview ( i.e . neither telephone internet access ) Are able read comprehend English
